author: AZFIREWOLF
title: A pretty good set
review: This is a pretty good set. Some people will find it very easy to build while others will have to spend a little more time. The biggest issue is you must look at the picture as you go through the build. If you don't then you will be scratching your head looking for pieces that you don't have.

author: TooMuchDew
title: One of the better MMMBs
review: 55 pieces (16 white cheese!) In my opinion, a nicer-looking snowman than the recent Creator Snowman http://www.brickset.com/detail/?set=30008-1 (his eyes creep me out) and easily converts to ornament use by replacing the "Black Round 2 x 2" with a "Black Round 2 x 2 - Lifting Ring". I've posted a scan of both sides of card at http://www.flickr.com/photos/toomuchdew/4251330148/ with a link to step-by-step instructions in the comments.
